Articles.Content:
I have noticed a few tag lines that people have Xhundred hours played....

Is there a debug screen or such where I can see this?

I'm new to the game so I'm thinking I have under 10...but I would like to track that.

Thanks everyone!

v
Well over 220 hours played.

If you have Steam and use the shortcut it will tell you. Otherwise, you'll just have to guess.

300-500 hours is my estimate.
236 H acording to steam
977 hours now

220. And that's only the stock hours, since I always use separate installs for mods. I guess I have at least the same amount of modded gameplay hours, which don't show up on steam cause I never mod the steam install.
200 on Steam, but I had the game well before the Steam release. So 500?

1469.

Will be adding to that shortly when this monster file finishes saving in Illustrator

0.

I never use steam if I don't have to.
Meanwhile it's 1501 hours. Since 0.19.

I don't know for sure, but assuming May 2nd (when i joined the forums) to today (NOV 8) is 920 days, assuming I've played KSP 75% of those days at least 2 hours...... is 2000+ and that doesn't even count the time I've spent talking/ running Zokesia on the forums....
1720 hours so says steam.
Steam won't be accurate if you make several installs for mods.
143 hours on steam, but I only moved to Steam in .23.5. I've been playing since .14, and I hate that I'll never know what the real number is.
1600 on steam, probably 2200 altogether.

Kerbal Space Program

30.4 hrs last two weeks / 515 hrs on record
1180 hrs, according to Steam, but I moved to several installs since 0.23.5 - so it's about 2000+ hrs, I guess.
I don't have Steam, but if I had to make an estimate it would be 1500+ hours . This game is just too good.

556 hours

According to Steam I bought the game on the 22.03.2013. That's 597 days till now. That means I play about 1 hour per day on average.

659 hours according to Steam.

I bought the game on July 25th 2014.
150 on steam but i can't tell with the launcher since 19.
378 in 2 years. Any one got 1000+?
I haven't kept track precisely, but simple math puts it between 1500 and 2000.
I don't play from steam so I don't know. I don't want to know.
